doc.description: 角色资源操作关系列表查询

sqlquery.name: SQL_SM_RoleResOpList.query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ rro.pid, rro.roleid, r.rolename, rro.resid, rs.resname, rro.opid, op.opname, r.pid rolepid /*COUNT*/ from bs_t_sm_role r, bs_t_sm_resource rs, bs_t_sm_operate op, bs_t_sm_roleresop rro where rro.roleid = r.pid and rro.resid = rs.pid and rro.opid = op.pid and rs.status = '1' and op.status = '1' $customwhere$ $privilege$ /*ORDERBY*/ order by /*ORDERBY*/ r.rolename, rro.roleid, rs.resname, rro.resid, op.opname, rro.opid

sqlquery.name: SQL_SM_RoleResOpList.theRole_query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ rro.pid, rro.roleid, r.rolename, rro.resid, rs.resname, rro.opid, op.opname /*COUNT*/ from bs_t_sm_role r, bs_t_sm_resource rs, bs_t_sm_operate op, bs_t_sm_roleresop rro where rro.roleid = r.pid and rro.resid = rs.pid and rro.opid = op.pid $customwhere$ order by rro.roleid, rro.resid, rro.opid
